    <static> noConflict() → {module:poly2tri}

    For Browser + <script> : reverts the poly2tri global object to its previous value, and returns a reference to the instance called.
    Source:
    • poly2tri.js, line 63
    Returns:
    instance called
    Type
    module:poly2tri
    Example
